contentfulPagePressRelease.title: World Innovation Summit for Health (WISH) joins forces with Health Affairs to launch September issue

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Health Affairs is publishing its next issue on 8 September 2014, focusing on global healthcare policy, featuring 10 articles written by World Innovation Summit for Health (WISH) authors and contributors.

The launch will take place at the National Press Club in Washington DC, USA and will be streamed live to a global audience.

The streaming will start at 9:00am EDT (4:00pm Doha time).

To follow the launch, please click here: http://www.wish-qatar.org/live-stream

You can also follow the conversation on Twitter @Wish_Qatar.
